languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, как вы могли прочитать в моем срочном донесении, вашей жизни угрожает смертельная опасность. Череда ваших впечатляющих побед на арене прогневала нечестивых ксеносов — ведьмы не дадут вам уйти жив{mf|ым|ой} со следующей битвы. Мы, как истинные слуги Империума, не можем позволить этому произойти. Жду ваших распоряжений!" {n}Сверкнув фуражкой, Комиссар звучно щелкает каблуками. Лишь едва заметная дрожь в руках выдает его волнение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, как вы могли прочитать в моем срочном донесении, вашей жизни угрожает смертельная опасность. Череда ваших впечатляющих побед на арене прогневала нечестивых ксеносов — ведьмы не дадут вам уйти жив{mf|ым|ой} со следующей битвы. Мы, как истинные слуги Империума, не можем позволить этому произойти. Жду ваших распоряжений!" {n}Сверкнув фуражкой, Комиссар звучно щелкает каблуками. Лишь едва заметная дрожь в руках выдает его волнение.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, as you may have read in my memo, your life is in mortal danger. Your series of impressive victories in the arena has incurred the ire of the profane xenos. The Wyches won't let you emerge from your next fight alive. As true servants of the Imperium, we cannot let that happen. Awaiting your orders!" {n}His peaked cap gleaming, the Commissar clicks his boots loudly. The only sign that betrays his trepidation is the faint trembling of his hands.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, как вы могли прочитать в моем срочном донесении, вашей жизни угрожает смертельная опасность. Череда ваших впечатляющих побед на арене прогневала нечестивых ксеносов — ведьмы не дадут вам уйти жив{mf|ым|ой} со следующей битвы. Мы, как истинные слуги Империума, не можем позволить этому произойти. Жду ваших распоряжений!" {n}Сверкнув фуражкой, Комиссар звучно щелкает каблуками. Лишь едва заметная дрожь в руках выдает его волнение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, as you may have read in my dispatch, your life is in mortal danger. Your impressive series of victories in the arena has incurred the ire of the profane xenos. The Wyches won't let you emerge from your next fight alive. As true servants of the Imperium, we cannot let that happen. Awaiting your orders!" {n}The Commissar's cap flashes as his boots click loudly. The only tell that gives away his trepidation is the faint trembling of his hands.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

The only sign that betrays his trepidation is the faint trembling of his hands.{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下、私のメモをお読みになったかもしれませんが、御身に危険が迫っています。闘技場での見事な連戦連勝で、冒涜的な異種族の怒りを買いました。ウィッチは次の戦いで必ず陛下を殺そうとするでしょう。帝国に仕える者として、それは認められません。命令をお待ちしています！」{n}上向いた帽子が光り、コミッサーのブーツの音が大きく響く。手のかすかな震えだけが、彼の不安な気持ちを物語っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, as you may have read in my memo, your life is in mortal danger. Your series of impressive victories in the arena has incurred the ire of the profane xenos. The Wyches won't let you emerge from your next fight alive. As true servants of the Imperium, we cannot let that happen. Awaiting your orders!" {n}His peaked cap gleaming, the Commissar clicks his boots loudly. The only sign that betrays his trepidation is the faint trembling of his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、私のメモをお読みになったかもしれませんが、御身に危険が迫っています。闘技場での見事な連戦連勝で、冒涜的な異種族の怒りを買いました。ウィッチは次の戦いで必ず陛下を殺そうとするでしょう。帝国に仕える者として、それは認められません。命令をお待ちしています！」{n}上向いた帽子が光り、コミッサーのブーツの音が大きく響く。手のかすかな震えだけが、彼の不安な気持ちを物語っている。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “大人，正如我在字条中提到的那样，您的生命目前处于致命危险之中。您在竞技场中赢得了许多场令人惊异的胜利，您的做法引起了那些邪恶异形的怒火。那些巫灵绝不会允许您在下一场战斗中活着离开。我们是帝国真正的仆人，我们决不能允许这样的事情发生。我们等待您的命令！”{n}政委的帽子反射着亮光，靴子发出了响亮的声音。只有他双手微弱的颤抖，暴露了他内心的恐惧。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, as you may have read in my memo, your life is in mortal danger. Your series of impressive victories in the arena has incurred the ire of the profane xenos. The Wyches won't let you emerge from your next fight alive. As true servants of the Imperium, we cannot let that happen. Awaiting your orders!" {n}His peaked cap gleaming, the Commissar clicks his boots loudly. The only sign that betrays his trepidation is the faint trembling of his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人，正如我在字条中提到的那样，您的生命目前处于致命危险之中。您在竞技场中赢得了许多场令人惊异的胜利，您的做法引起了那些邪恶异形的怒火。那些巫灵绝不会允许您在下一场战斗中活着离开。我们是帝国真正的仆人，我们决不能允许这样的事情发生。我们等待您的命令！”{n}政委的帽子反射着亮光，靴子发出了响亮的咔哒声。只有他双手微弱的颤抖，暴露了他内心的恐惧。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, como habrá leído en mi memorándum, su vida está en peligro. Su impresionante racha de victorias en la arena ha provocado la ira de los malditos xenos. Las Brujas no le permitirán salir con vida de su próximo combate. Como verdaderos sirvientes del Imperium, no podemos permitir que eso ocurra. ¡Esperamos sus órdenes!». {n}La gorra del Comisario brilla mientras sus botas chasquean con fuerza. Lo único que delata su inquietud es el leve temblor de sus manos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, as you may have read in my memo, your life is in mortal danger. Your series of impressive victories in the arena has incurred the ire of the profane xenos. The Wyches won't let you emerge from your next fight alive. As true servants of the Imperium, we cannot let that happen. Awaiting your orders!" {n}His peaked cap gleaming, the Commissar clicks his boots loudly. The only sign that betrays his trepidation is the faint trembling of his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, como habrá leído en mi memorándum, su vida está en peligro. Su impresionante racha de victorias en la arena ha provocado la ira de los malditos xenos. Las Brujas no le permitirán salir con vida de su próximo combate. Como verdaderos sirvientes del Imperium, no podemos permitir que eso ocurra. ¡Esperamos sus órdenes!». {n}La gorra del Comisario parpadea mientras sus botas chasquean con fuerza. Lo único que delata su inquietud es el leve temblor de sus manos.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, wie Ihr vielleicht in meiner Nachricht gelesen habt, ist Euer Leben in Gefahr. Eure Serie von beeindruckenden Siegen in der Arena hat den Zorn der profanen Xenos geweckt. Die Hekatari werden Euch nicht lebend aus Eurem nächsten Kampf entkommen lassen. Als wahre Diener des Imperiums dürfen wir das nicht zulassen. Wir erwarten Eure Befehle!" {n}Mit schimmernder Schirmmütze schlägt der Kommissar lautstark seine Stiefel aneinander. Allein das unmerkliche Zittern seiner Hände verrät seine innere Unruhe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, as you may have read in my memo, your life is in mortal danger. Your series of impressive victories in the arena has incurred the ire of the profane xenos. The Wyches won't let you emerge from your next fight alive. As true servants of the Imperium, we cannot let that happen. Awaiting your orders!" {n}His peaked cap gleaming, the Commissar clicks his boots loudly. The only sign that betrays his trepidation is the faint trembling of his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, wie Ihr vielleicht in meiner Nachricht gelesen habt, ist Euer Leben in Gefahr. Eure beeindruckende Reihe von Siegen in der Arena hat den Zorn der profanen Xenos geweckt. Die Hekatari werden Euch nicht lebend aus Eurem nächsten Kampf entkommen lassen. Als wahre Diener des Imperiums dürfen wir das nicht zulassen. Wir erwarten Eure Befehle!" {n}Die Kappe des Kommissars blitzt auf, als seine Stiefel laut zusammenklacken. Nur das leichte Zittern seiner Hände verrät seine innere Unruhe.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, comme je le disais dans mon message, votre vie est en grand danger. Votre impressionnante série de victoires dans l'arène a provoqué l'ire des xénos. Les Cérastes ne vous permettront pas de sortir {mf|vivant|vivante} du prochain combat. En tant que serviteurs de l'Imperium, nous ne pouvons le permettre. Nous attendons vos ordres ! » {n}Le commissaire claque des talons, son couvre-chef étincelant. Seul le tremblement de ses mains trahit sa profonde inquiétude.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, as you may have read in my memo, your life is in mortal danger. Your series of impressive victories in the arena has incurred the ire of the profane xenos. The Wyches won't let you emerge from your next fight alive. As true servants of the Imperium, we cannot let that happen. Awaiting your orders!" {n}His peaked cap gleaming, the Commissar clicks his boots loudly. The only sign that betrays his trepidation is the faint trembling of his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, comme je le disais dans mon message, votre vie est en grand danger. Votre impressionnante série de victoires dans l'arène a provoqué l'ire des xénos. Les Cérastes ne vous permettront pas de sortir {mf|vivant|vivante} du prochain combat. En tant que serviteurs de l'Imperium, nous ne pouvons le permettre. Nous attendons vos ordres ! » {n}Le commissaire claque des talons, faisant virevolter sa cape. Seul le tremblement de ses mains trahit sa profonde inquiétude.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, gönderdiğim mesajda yazdığım üzere hayatınız büyük tehlikede. Arenada art arda etkileyici galibiyetler elde ederek dinsiz zenoları hüsrana uğrattınız. Viçler, bir sonraki dövüşünüzden sağ çıkmanıza müsaade etmeyecek. İmparatorluk'un gerçek hizmetkârları olarak buna izin veremeyiz. Emrinize amadeyiz!" {n}Siperli başlığı parlayan Komiser, çizmelerini yüksek sesle şaklatıyor. Ellerinin hafif titreyişi ise endişesini belli ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, as you may have read in my memo, your life is in mortal danger. Your series of impressive victories in the arena has incurred the ire of the profane xenos. The Wyches won't let you emerge from your next fight alive. As true servants of the Imperium, we cannot let that happen. Awaiting your orders!" {n}His peaked cap gleaming, the Commissar clicks his boots loudly. The only sign that betrays his trepidation is the faint trembling of his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, gönderdiğim mesajda yazdığım üzere, hayatınız büyük bir risk altında. Arenada art arda etkileyici galibiyetler elde ederek dinsiz zenoları hüsrana uğrattınız. Viçler, bir sonraki dövüşünüzden sağ çıkmanıza engel olacak. İmparatorluk'un gerçek hizmetkârları olarak buna müsaade edemeyiz. Emrinize amadeyiz!" {n}Siperli başlığı parlayan Komiser, çizmelerini yüksek sesle şıklatıyor. Endişesi, sadece ellerinin hafifçe titremesinden belli oluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
